decimal_weekly: ${name} takes care of ${count} dogs. Each dog takes ${rate_decimal} hours a day to walk and take care of their business. How many hours a week ${does_do} ${subject} spend taking care of dogs?

${name} has ${count} plants in ${possessive} garden that need daily attention. Each plant needs ${rate_decimal} cups of water per day to stay healthy. How many cups of water ${does_do} ${subject} use in a week?

Every day, ${name} walks ${count} dogs in the neighborhood as a part-time job. Each walk takes ${rate_decimal} hours to complete properly. How many hours ${does_do} ${subject} spend walking dogs each week?

A dedicated teacher grades ${count} student papers each day. Each paper takes ${rate_decimal} hours to grade thoroughly with feedback. If the teacher works ${days} days a week, how many hours total does grading take?

${name} exercises ${count} times a day to stay in shape for the upcoming marathon. Each session lasts ${rate_decimal} hours and includes both cardio and strength training. How many hours ${does_do} ${subject} exercise in ${days} days?

${name} is a professional dog walker who takes care of ${count} dogs every single day. It takes ${rate_decimal} hours to properly walk and care for each dog. How many hours ${does_do} ${subject} spend on dog walking per week?

At the community garden, ${name} tends to ${count} vegetable plots. Each plot requires ${rate_decimal} hours of maintenance per day including watering and weeding. How many hours a week ${does_do} ${subject} spend at the garden?
simple_rate: ${name} can complete ${count} tasks per hour when ${subject} ${is_are} focused and working efficiently. Working for ${rate_decimal} hours today, how many tasks can ${subject} complete?
A machine at the factory produces ${count} items per minute when running at full capacity. How many items does it produce in ${rate_decimal} minutes?
${name} types at a speed of ${count} words per minute. If ${subject} type${verb_s} for ${rate_decimal} minutes without stopping, how many words will ${subject} have typed?
The bakery oven can bake ${count} cookies per batch. If ${name} runs the oven for ${rate_decimal} batches, how many cookies will be ready?
comparison_total: At the manufacturing plant, Machine A produces ${rate} ${items} per hour running at standard speed. Machine B is newer and produces ${multiplier} times as many ${items} per hour. How many ${items} do both machines produce together in ${hours} hours?

Factory A makes ${rate} ${items} per hour with its current equipment. Factory B recently upgraded and now makes ${multiplier} times as many per hour as Factory A. What is the combined output of both factories after ${hours} hours of operation?

In the office, Printer A prints ${rate} pages per hour. Printer B is a high-speed model that prints ${multiplier} times faster than Printer A. How many pages do both printers print in total during ${hours} hours?

Worker A completes ${rate} ${items} per hour at a steady pace. Worker B is more experienced and is ${multiplier} times as fast as Worker A. Together, how many ${items} do they finish in ${hours} hours of work?
